sn3.9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ranno pasenadissa kosalassa mahayanno paccupatthito hoti, panca ca usabhasatani panca ca vacchatarasatani panca ca vacchatarisatani panca ca ajasatani panca ca urabbhasatani thunupanitani honti yannatthaya.
sn3.9:1.3: Yepissa te honti dasati va pessati va kammakarati va, tepi dandatajjita bhayatajjita assumukha rudamana parikammani karonti.
sn3.9:2.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisimsu.
sn3.9:2.2: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn3.9:2.3: “idha, bhante, ranno pasenadissa kosalassa mahayanno paccupatthito hoti, panca ca usabhasatani panca ca vacchatarasatani panca ca vacchatarisatani panca ca ajasatani panca ca urabbhasatani thunupanitani honti yannatthaya.
sn3.9:2.4: Yepissa te honti dasati va pessati va kammakarati va, tepi dandatajjita bhayatajjita assumukha rudamana parikammani karonti”ti.
sn3.9:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam ima gathayo abhasi:
